title: Pedagogical Scaffolding Strategies for Technology Integration in Geography Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental theories of geography education and secondary-level teaching experience
context.additional_context: Technology integration competency enhancement program for in-service geography teachers in a smartphone-based LMS environment.

learning_goals: Learners can create lesson design plans utilizing three or more digital tools (map-making apps, data visualization tools, etc.) suitable for geography classes
Learners can develop three-stage pedagogical scaffolding (introduction → development → conclusion) for technology-integrated instructional activities based on the TPACK model
Learners can design five or more mobile-friendly tasks to enhance geography inquiry skills and upload them to an LMS

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
